roles.title: Platform Reliability Manager
roles.description: Detect and address patterns of platform behavior that impact stability and uptime. Analyze and report platform health data. Manage on-call rotations and incident response.

roles.title: Support Manager
roles.description: Mentored a remote team of support engineers. Developed internal tools and analyzed platform data to continuously improve customer experience.

roles.title: Senior Customer Success Engineer
roles.description: Provided technical guidance to developers working on the Pantheon platform. Resolved performance and security escalations. Wrote documentation and delievered trainings for the support team.

roles.title: Senior Developer/Tech Lead
roles.description: Agile website development for non-profits, unions, and universities.

company: American Public Media | Minnesota Public Radio

roles.title: Multimedia Designer
